title: Object - Issuer
description: Object describing the issuer of the cap table (the company whose cap table this is)

country_of_formation.description: The country where the issuer company was legally formed (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

state_of_formation.description: The state, province, or subdivision where the issuer company was legally formed (ISO-3166-2)

tax_ids.title: Issuer - Tax ID Array
tax_ids.description: The tax ids for this issuer company

email.description: A work email that the issuer company can be reached at

phone.description: A phone number that the issuer company can be reached at

address.description: The headquarters address of the issuing company
